subject: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The USP Store Manager,
 i am currently at San Francisco International Airport with your Parcel, get back to me asap with ur delivery info for the Custom Clearance to enable me complete the delivery
. contact me via this email 
scholzeadolph@gmail.com

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
Hello Mr. Adolph Scholze,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're having a good day. I received your message about the parcel at the San Francisco Airport. Could you please provide me with more information about the delivery? What kind of parcel is it and what are the next steps for the custom clearance?

I appreciate your assistance in completing the delivery process. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daryl

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
How are you doing today and how about your family ?, I hope everybody is in
good health .

It's been couple of weeks now you have been ignoring my emails , which is a
very bad behavior , I'm letting you know that your the lady has sued you
again for impersonation as the owner of the funds , she claimed that her
late husband is the real owner and person in place of receiving the funds .

At this edge , the Court became confuse about the whole thing , I want to
officially inform you that your your Funds will be release the this lady if
you do not prove yourself as the owner of the funds by complying with the
needful fee as a serious person as the owner .

Your failure to respond will be the cause of the release of the funds to
the opponent.

Thank you

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
I acknowledge the receipt of your mail and the content is well understood.

As the owner of the funds , you were told to conduct the needed clearance
to enable you receive your ATM Card but you ignored it.

With that act you have shown several times , the Court is willing to
release the Atm card to the plaintiff .

My advise to goes this way if you want to receive what is rightfully yours
, kindly make the clearance fee of 75.00 available otherwise the court will
consider you as the wrong person and accept the clearance fee from the
plaintiff attorney and release the Atm card to her as the law stated .

Get back to me asap .

Thank you

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the information you provided about the needed clearance for receiving the ATM card. Can you please provide more details about the clearance process and how to proceed with making the payment? I want to ensure that everything is done correctly.

Best wishes,
Daryl

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
I acknowledge the receipt of your mail and the content is well understood.

To proceed with your request , you will need to cover the required fee
articulated on our first notification mail , that is the reason you still
haven't receive your ATM Card yet .

So Kindly get back to me asap to know your arrangement regarding the fee
because with the multiple turn down the court has decided to release the
fund to your opponent who claim that her late husband is the rightful owner
of the funds and she's willing to incure the charges for the release of the
Atm card to their family .

Your urgent response will be appreciated to enable you get the information
you need for making the payment today otherwise you ,you won't have the
opportunity to receive the Atm card in the next 24hours hour .

Thank you .

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
Hello! Thank you for your message. I appreciate the update regarding my ATM card. Could you please provide more details about the required fee and how it needs to be paid? I want to ensure that everything is in order so that I can receive my card as soon as possible. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Daryl

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
I acknowledge the receipt of your mail and the content within.

You can Remit the fee Using Bitcoin or you can remit it through wester
union transfer to our department.

The fee is the only thing delaying the delivery delivery to take place , so
let me know how you would like to remit the fee via Bitcoin or western
union transfer.

Thank you

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
I acknowledge the receipt of your mail and the content is well understood.

Below is the Bitcoin Wallet address where to remit the fee .

You will need to remit it through your Bitcoin account or go to the nearest
Wal-Mart or target store , all you need is to present the below wallet
address to the cashier with the amount you want to send , therefore they
will make the payment and give you a transfer receipt .

Below is the wallet address.

38zRe7i4CbSpfVfcsohnTmDWzAPvCGWcWr

Amount 75.00 usd .

I will be waiting for your response asap with copy of Bitcoin transfer
receipt .

Thank you
